meanings.definition: The quality or state of being vast.
meanings.sent1: The vastitude of the ocean amazed the children on the beach.
meanings.sent2: The vastitude of the desert stretched out before us endlessly.
meanings.sent3: The vastitude of the ice cream sundae made Tommy's eyes widen in delight.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt a vastitude of emotions as she watched the sunset.
meanings.sent5: The vastitude of the mountain range took her breath away.

meanings.sent1: The vastitude of the forest was home to many different animals.
meanings.sent2: We marveled at the vastitude of the open field under the starry sky.
meanings.sent3: The vastitude of the buffet left everyone feeling full and content.
meanings.sent4: His mind wandered through the vastitude of space as he gazed at the stars.
meanings.sent5: The vastitude of the library overwhelmed her with its endless shelves of books.
